text: Amata perixanthia is a moth of the family Erebidae first described by George Hampson in 1898. It is found in Taiwan, Tibet and eastern China. ==References== Perixan Category:Moths of Asia Category:Moths of China Category:Fauna of the Himalayas Category:Fauna of Tibet Category:Lepidoptera of Nepal Category:Moths described in 1898
title: Amata perixanthia
